variations.content:
NOTICE: Basic tier selected. Limitations include:
- No high availability guarantees
- Limited performance during peak loads
- Basic support SLA (24hr response)

For production workloads, 'Standard' tier provides HA, performance scaling, and enterprise SLA.
variations.cta:
To upgrade to the Standard Tier execute the following command:
confluent kafka cluster update {{id}} --type standard

variations.content:
NOTICE: Stream Governance Essentials selected. Limitations include:
- Limited schema compatibility checks
- Basic schema management
- No schema validation

For production workloads, 'Advanced' tier provides full schema compatibility, advanced validation, and enterprise-grade governance.
variations.cta:
To upgrade to Stream Governance Advanced execute the following command:
confluent environment update {{id}} --governance-package advanced
